turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can get that ordered for you. which starbucks did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Starbucks Find the address.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is the Starbucks on 1 Cowlitz Way, Ridgefield, WA, 98642.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i got the starbucks you asked for on file. and what did you want to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a grande iced caramel macchiato with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that was 1 grande iced caramel macchiato with whole milk from starbucks on 1 callex way in washington.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order will come out to $3.40.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your caramel macchiato has been ordered. it'll be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll send over your receipt to your phone soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I don't need anything else.
